programme.title: The Queen Of Castle Ep25
programme.desc: When Chairman Wang dies suddenly, chaos erupts in Ming Lang's medical empire. His widow unites with her daughters-in-law to battle schemers. Then, a mysterious figure returns to claim power.

programme.title: The Fading Gold Ep15
programme.desc: After a car crash, Fong Yeung Tin shocks everyone by marrying a wife 30 years younger & placing the family fortune in a rival-ran trust, triggering family lawsuits & a hunt for the hidden mastermind.
